rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entrance with reception area and coat closet.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living area adjoining the kitchen and dining area; ideal for gatherings.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Semi-open space connected with the kitchen and living room.

rooms.name: Open-Plan Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully integrated kitchen with dining area, designed for efficiency and social interaction.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Private master bedroom with attached bathroom and walk-in closet; ideally placed in the southeast corner for positive energy as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Cozy guest/child bedroom with adequate storage, located near the master bedroom.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom maintaining privacy and tranquility; positioned on the west side.

rooms.name: Guest Toilet
rooms.description: Convenient guest toilet located near the living area.
